main_detail.title: Ingredient Highlights
main_detail.description: Features two forms of Hyaluronic Acid plus a blend of powerful natural fruit extracts, antioxidants and a peptide leaving skin with a smooth, refreshed appearance.                 The ultra-light texture absorbs instantly without leaving skin feeling greasy.
feature: farm-made Calendula extract + Organic Sunflower Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia Seed) Oil, Raspberry (Rubus idaeus) Oil
Borage Flower, Rosemary Leaf, Calendula Flower, Dandelion Leaf,

Gomphrena globosa Flower, Moringa Flower, German Chamomile Flower

sub_detail.title: Ingredient Highlights
sub_detail.feature: Borage Flower, Rosemary Leaf, Calendula Flower, Dandelion Leaf,,Farm-Grown Beauty Blend - a sunflower seed oil-based maceration of Lavender Flower,Nettle Leaf, and Artemisia Flower ,Gomphrena globosa Flower, Moringa Flower, German Chamomile Flower,Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil

detail.sub_detail_2: Luna is personal to me - it was my first plant oil creation. Luna is deeply intoxicating with the additional blend of the sweet, floral aroma of Clary Sage + the rich, earthy and woody aroma of Sandalwood. This new blend is similar to the experience you have when you walk through my gardens at our farm. If you’ve never tried a cleansing oil, I know you and your skin will love Luna and your experience will be one you come back to – every day.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: All the benefits of our cult-favorite Extra Repair Moisturizing Balm—now in a lightweight yet luxurious cream

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: This skin-nourishing formula utilizes a unique Triple Emulsion Technology to give the cream its lightweight texture while still allowing it to be incredibly moisturizing

detail.sub_detail_2: Normal to Extra Dry skin types and perfect for those in humid climates (or anyone who prefers a lighter feel).

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A go-anywhere set of our NEW super-smooth, ultra-hydrating, non-sticky lip gloss in three ultra-flattering shades.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: Swipe across lips and go or layer over Crushed Lip Color for a bolder look.
sub_detail.feature: Swipe across lips and go or layer over Crushed Lip Color for a bolder look.

detail.sub_detail_2: Swipe across lips and go or layer over Crushed Lip Color for a bolder look.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: This formula combines the moisturizing power of Shea Butter with Vitamins B, C and E. Grapefruit and Geranium fragrances leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. With daily use, skin looks and feels its best.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
sub_detail.feature: Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: Designed to brighten undereyes and cover even the most stubborn dark circles, this creamy, blendable formula instantly neutralizes discoloration and layers perfectly under concealer. Available in 16 color-correcting pink- and peach-based shades formulated for all types of undereye discoloration.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: To find your shade, take a look at the discoloration under the eye. If it’s bluish-purple, choose a bisque shade. If it’s greenish-brown, choose a peach shade. If it’s a mix of both, choose a peach bisque shade.
sub_detail.feature: Using the Concealer Brush (sold separately), apply Corrector to areas of discoloration, getting as close to the lashline and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger.

detail.sub_detail_2: Using the Concealer Brush (sold separately), apply Corrector to areas of discoloration, getting as close to the lashline and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: The perfect complement to a smokey eye look, this kohl-pigmented mascara delivers high drama by creating extremely black, stretched-out lashes in an instant. Plus, the long-wearing formula holds its own against flaking, smudging, sweat and humidity.
feature: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Cera Carnauba\Cire De Carnauba

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Builds volume lash by lash as opposed to traditional volumizing formulas that create the appearance of volume by clumping lashes together. Plus, a thicker brush base evenly combs through eyelashes from roots to ends, while a tapered tip grabs those small, hard-to-reach lashes.
sub_detail.feature: Brush from base to tips of lashes and let dry.

detail.sub_detail_2: Brush from base to tips of lashes and let dry.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: A long-wearing brow pencil with a slanted, chiseled tip that lets you softly fill in brows with the flat edge or boldly define them with the pointed tip. Plus, the attached spoolie diffuses color and combs hairs into place for a naturally polished look. Waterproof and sweat resistant.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: Use the flat side of the pencil to fill in the head of the brow, and then with the pointed tip use short strokes to define the arch and tail. For a bolder look, use the pointed tip to define the length of the brow, and then go over the edges for added definition. Comb hairs into place using the attached spoolie.
sub_detail.feature: Use the flat side of the pencil to fill in the head of the brow, and then with the pointed tip use short strokes to define the arch and tail. For a bolder look, use the pointed tip to define the length of the brow, and then go over the edges for added definition. Comb hairs into place using the attached spoolie.

detail.sub_detail_2: Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates, Animal Derived Ingredients, Gluten, Sulfites, Mineral Oil, Tricolsan, Formaldehyde

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: a perfect fragrance base to make you feel infinitely clean. a pure scent of a veil of water lily with a subtle freshness, the simple, modern tones of leafy greens and frosted musk brings a refreshing finish.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: spray mist from any angle over entire body after shower or bath or anytime you want to feel surrounded by love and happiness. can be used alone or underneath any of our fragrances.
sub_detail.feature: smell soap and water clean with the light scent of our pure grace body spritz.

detail.sub_detail_2: smell soap and water clean with the light scent of our pure grace body spritz.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: this firming body emulsion is an award-winning body moisturizer for dry, aged or wrinkled skin.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: apply a generous amount to skin with fingertips, and massage in gently with a soothing, circular motion.
sub_detail.feature: infused with the amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of philosophy's bestselling amazing grace fragrance, this firming body emulsion is an award-winning moisturizer for dry skin. includes an antioxidant and firming ingredient to help skin feel more toned.

detail.sub_detail_2: infused with the amazingly clean, beautifully feminine scent of philosophy's bestselling amazing grace fragrance, this firming body emulsion is an award-winning moisturizer for dry skin. includes an antioxidant and firming ingredient to help skin feel more toned.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: introducing pure grace nude rose, an airy rose scent inspired by the bare color of nude rose petals and the clean, fresh feel of our beloved pure grace.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: apply to wet body or scalp. lather, rinse, repeat. if using as a bubble bath, drizzle a generous amount under running water and enjoy.
sub_detail.feature: apply to wet body or scalp. lather, rinse, repeat. if using as a bubble bath, drizzle a generous amount under running water and enjoy.

detail.sub_detail_2: our multi-tasking formula cleanses and conditions with a rich, foaming lather, leaving skin and hair feeling silky soft and lightly scented.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: feel cleaner and more graceful than ever with our pure grace spray fragrance.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: spray onto a clean, dry body. avoid direct eye contact.
sub_detail.feature: pure grace eau de toilette is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower.

detail.sub_detail_2: pure grace eau de toilette is our infinitely clean fragrance in a concentrated form. clean and universally appealing, this soap and water scent is the perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to feel as though they just stepped out of the shower.
